title: How to inspire success - Share Your Story - Quora

response.answer_text: One thing I have understood about success. YOU can be inspired by success, but that will not make you successful. I am not successful, will I be one day? That depends on what you define as successful. Technically, we are all successful. We are alive after all right? But I think you are point towards “monetary success”. When you want monetary success in life you have to be willing to give up certain things. I inspire to be successful just like you inspire to be successful, but what do I give up that you don’t? Motivation only lasts so long, it slowly dissipates, to “inspire” success you need DETERMINATION. Determination is what will outlast motivation or any other word you can come up with to “inspire success”. “I AM determined to be successful in ______” is something that I tell myself upon waking up each morning and I ask myself each night before I got to sleep. Try it for yourself. It takes 30-days (actually 21 to re-wire our brains, but I like to day 30). After 30-days, let me know if your thinking is different. Take care!!
